cmipaccess.local.global_data_access.get_detrended_global_time_series

cmipaccess.local.global_data_access.get_detrended_global_time_series(model, experiment, realisation, variable, **kwargs)[source]

Return the global time series of a variable with the control experiment drift removed. The drift is computed as a linear trend in time of the control experiment parallel to the experiment.

Parameters:

  • model (str) – Climate model name

  • experiment (str) – Experiment id

  • variable (str) – Variable id

  • realisation (str) – member id

Returns:

dataset containing the global timeseries with the control drift removed, along with the mean control value and the number of years of control run parallel to the experiment.

Return type:

xr.Dataset
